arts.ttl: The lowdown on Charlton Athletic 4 Huddersfield Town 0 - Tyreece Campbell grabs brace in dominant display
arts.sum: Charlton Athletic: Mannion, Ramsay, Gillesphey, Jones, Edwards (Watson 73), Coventry (McIntyre 86), Campbell (Dixon 73), Berry (Anderson 74), Docherty, Small, Godden (Aneke 73). Charlton continued their remarkable home form with a comprehensive win over fellow promotion hopefuls Huddersfield Town.

arts.ttl: Nathan Jones after Tyreece Campbell’s superb two-goal showing against Huddersfield: That’s what we tell him
arts.sum: “I’m glad he’s saying that because that’s what we tell him,” said Jones. There’s plenty more to come but he’s a joy to work with, every day he works hard, every day he comes in there’s smile on his face.

arts.ttl: Tyreece Campbell at the double as Charlton crush Huddersfield
arts.sum: Matty Godden opened the scoring inside a minute.

arts.ttl: ‘Hopefully I can show Charlton this is the place I want to be’ - Tennai Watson on wanting SE7 stay
arts.sum: Watson had only played seven times in League One this season before starting back-to-back games in the third tier against Wigan and Peterborough. “The timing of it was bad because I felt as though I was going to get a string of games.

arts.ttl: ‘Charlton at Wembley again would be unbelievable occasion’ - skipper Greg Docherty on League One play-off push
arts.sum: Greg Docherty says it would be the greatest achievement of his career if he won promotion with Charlton Athletic this season. “There is no denying we went through some really difficult lows this season, but we never lost sight of where we want to get to.

arts.ttl: Tyreece Campbell exclusive: ‘I’m named after 2Pac, but my idol is Ademola Lookman’
arts.sum: The name’s Campbell. Tyreece Anthony Tupac Shakur Campbell. Yes, genuinely.

arts.ttl: Huddersfield interim boss quizzed on potential play-off dress rehearsal at Charlton Athletic
arts.sum: Interim Huddersfield head coach Jon Worthington dismissed talk of tomorrow’s League One promotion clash at Charlton Athletic as a dress rehearsal for the play-offs. “The sole focus is just on this game and then we’re on to the next one.
